name: Lysandra Veilwind
appearance: Tall and slender, with long silver hair tied back in a practical braid. She wears dark robes adorned with arcane sigils that seem to glow faintly when she casts spells.

stunts.name: Arcane Reflexes
stunts.description: You can cast a spell before the target even knows what's happening.

stunts.name: Mnemonic Recall
stunts.description: When rolling for Spellcraft, you can reroll once if you've memorized the ritual steps at least once before.

stunts.name: Shadowy Connections
stunts.description: You have an uncanny ability to find hidden information or contacts related to your lost knowledge pursuits.

fears: Unraveling one's mind in pursuit of knowledge
desires: Unlocking the secrets of long-lost civilizations
Sharing her discoveries with those who will understand

backstory.origin: Born into an esteemed lineage of scholars and mages, Lysandra was raised among ancient texts and forbidden magic.
backstory.formativeEvent: She uncovered a cryptic tome that revealed the location of a lost city filled with arcane secrets. Determined to learn its mysteries, she embarked on a journey across the Shattered Realms.
backstory.secret: Hidden within her robes is an amulet said to channel ancient power, guiding her path.
backstory.summary: Haunted by the knowledge she seeks and the dangers of her own magic, Lysandra wanders the world in search of answers.

voice.quirks: Often trails off mid-sentence, lost in thought

loc-1764180850906.name: The Shadowed Keep
loc-1764180850906.details: A crumbling fortress once ruled by the dark elves of the Shattered Realms. Overgrown with twisted vines and haunted by the echoes of ancient sorcery, it stands as a testament to forgotten power.
